title: Amnon and Tamar
summary: David’s son Amnon becomes obsessed with his half-sister Tamar and violates her. Tamar’s brother Absalom waits two years, then kills Amnon in revenge. Absalom flees into exile.

faq.question: What happened between Amnon and Tamar?
faq.answer: Amnon tricked and raped her, then rejected her in shame.

faq.question: How did Absalom respond?
faq.answer: He waited for the right moment and then had Amnon killed.
